item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Kita hanya bisa memahami keajaiban hidup secara penuh ketika membiarkan yang tak terduga untuk terjadi." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "But love is much like a dam; if you allow a tiny crack to form through which only a trickle of water can pass, that trickle will quickly bring down the whole structure and soon no one will be able to control the force of the current." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If I am really a part of your dream, you'll come back one day." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You say they create their own reality," said Veronika, "but what is reality?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And that no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dreams, because every second of the search is a second's encounter with God and with eternity." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Michelle add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West
